Electrifying The Ivys

Preparing for a future of sustainable energy.

Get Started

Unblock residents from owning electric vehicles

The Electric Charging Committee has been formed to investigate and facilitate the installation of Electric Vehicle chargers.

We need your help.

To find the option best for all members, we ask that you complete a short survey.

Start Survey

Project Timeline

  • Electric Charging Committee Established Early May, 2019

  • Consulted with the City of Vancouver Mid May, 2019

    Representative from the City of Vancouver were consulted. Standard practices, opportunities, challenges, and incentives were discussed and have shaped the approach going forward.

  • On-site Walkthrough and Evaluation Late May, 2019

    A vendor is currently being scheduled to perform an on-site walkthrough to advise us regarding installation options and cost estimate.

  • Website and Survey go live Early June, 2019

    This website and the owner survey go live. Banners are posted in the common areas encouraging owners to complete the survey.

  • Charger Incentives Early July, 2019

    It is anticipated that the charger installation incentive will be funded and start accepting applications.

  • Bring Proposal to strata board for review. ???, 2019

    A proposal based on site surveys, quotes, and owner interest will be brought to the board for review.

  • Apply to charger incentive ???, 2019

    Once the proposal is reviewed by the Strata Board, apply to the incentive program.

  • Bring revised proposal to general vote ???, 2019

    Once reviewed by the board, the proposal will be brought to a general vote for approval.

  • Install chargers ???, 2019

    If the vote is successful, use the chosen contractor to install and set up chargers.

  • Submit for incentive Reimbursement ???, 2019

    Submit invoice for incentive reimbursement.

  • Chargers ready for use. November, 2019

    Anticipated 'ready' date.

  • Expected cost neutral date Before the end of 2021

    Based on best available guesses, this is the date we anticipate the contingency fund borrowing will be paid back.
